sentences.sContent: Steve was in a particularly bad mood when he got back.
sentences.sCn: 史蒂夫回来时情绪特别不好。

sentences.sContent: The restaurant is particularly popular with young people.
sentences.sCn: 那家餐厅尤其受到年轻人的欢迎。

sentences.sContent: We are hoping to expand our business, particularly in Europe.
sentences.sCn: 我们希望扩大业务，尤其是在欧洲。

sentences.sContent: British farmers, particularly those producing lamb, are very worried.
sentences.sCn: 英国农场主，尤其是养羊羔的农场主，非常担忧。

synos.tran: 特别地，独特地；详细地，具体地；明确地，细致地

words.tran: 特别的；详细的；独有的；挑剔的
特殊神宠论；完全忠于一种理论

trans.tranOther: more than usual or more than others
